summary: This document outlines the policy and procedures for presentations to the Americas Region Reputational Risk Committee (ARRC) at Deutsche Bank. It details the responsibilities of presenters, the necessary approvals required from various executives, and the agenda for quarterly meetings focused on reputational risk management.

keyFacts: The document outlines the policy for presentations to the ARRC at Deutsche Bank.
Presentations must be made by individuals at the Managing Director or Director level.
Pre-clearance is required from various executives for different regional proposals.
Quarterly meetings will review the regional reputational risk profile and trends.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
